name: Squad Battles: Eagles Strike
summary:
HPS Simulations and John Tiller are proud to announce the release of Squad Battles: Eagles Strike which includes contains 30 scenarios covering the fighting by the Americans from D-Day through the Bulge and the end of the war in Europe.

 

In the summer of 1944, after four years of German occupation, the Americans were ready to strike at the heart of Fortress Europa and help end the war. This struggle would pit the Americans against the Germans from the beaches and boscage of Normandy to the Ardennes and beyond. The American soldier would have to face the German Panzers which had ruled the length and breadth of the German conquest and find a way to prevail. This strike of the American eagle would help bring the German Reich to its knees.
